quotes.text: Technology is a word that describes something that doesn’t work yet.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: All this modern technology just makes people try to do everything at once.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: We are stuck with technology when what we really want is just stuff that works.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: Humanity is acquiring all the right technology for all the wrong reasons.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.text: It’s supposed to be automatic, but actually you have to push this button.
quotes.author: John Brunner

quotes.text: It’s supposed to be automatic, but actually you have to push this button.
quotes.author: John Brunner

quotes.text: The human spirit must prevail over technology.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: This is why I loved technology: if you used it right, it could give you power and privacy.
quotes.author: Cory Doctorow
